name: lab1
description: Install Node.js Create app.js file Create Dockerfile Creating a package.json file with all needed metadata by: **npm init** Install Express web application framework: **npm install express** Build docker image: **docker build -t user1name/devops .** Push docker image to dockerhub:     **docker login**     **docker push user1name/devops** Run container with cpu and memory constraints: **docker run -m 20m --cpus=0.1 -d -p 80:80 --name node-app devops-l1**
